description:
At the law firm of Sumner & Associates, P.C., in Rochester Hills, Michigan, we are fully prepared to help you with all of the important and pressing legal issues affecting your life, your family, your freedom and your future.

Serving clients throughout Oakland County, Macomb County, Clinton Township, the Village of Clarkston, Novi and the surrounding Detroit metro area, the attorneys at our law firm possess decades of legal experience, and we have earned a reputation as one of the top legal practices in the region for those dealing with legal challenges involving any of the following:

• Divorce and family law
• DUI and criminal defense
• Estate planning, trusts, wills and probate
• Personal injury

Our commitment to you is to deliver the quality, effective advocacy, counsel and support you deserve as we help you secure the most favorable outcome possible for your situation. Working directly with you, we promise to provide you with the information you need to make the best informed decisions about your case, and we will always keep your rights and best interests at the forefront of our efforts as we fight to achieve the results you seek.

From this high level of client commitment and customer service, our attorneys have earned numerous awards and honors, and our law firm has received many positive reviews and referrals from satisfied clients as well as from other attorneys who know we can tackle even the toughest cases efficiently.

To find out more about how Sumner & Associates, P.C., can best serve your needs and help you secure a brighter future for yourself and your family, you can schedule a free initial consultation by contacting our law office or visiting our website.
